item.title: Add more runes to runes shop
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

here go into shops.cfg and look under Aubury’s_rune_shop and earase all of the code there, then add this in it’s place:

shop = 2	Aubury's_Rune_Store				2	2	554	50000	555	50000	556	50000	557	50000	558	50000	559	50000	562	5000	560	25000	4278	25000	563	25000

Ok then Auburys rune shop will now have all runes (expcept bloods because of server crashes its replaced with ecto-tokens. And if your using Testscape then ecto-tokens work in place of bloods on sepcific spells.

[hidefromsilab]rep++ rocks!!![/hidefromsilab]

Read full topic
item.source: Add more runes to runes shop

item.title: Add more runes to runes shop
item.dc:creator: @skys_shadow skys shadow
item.description:
@skys_shadow wrote:

well i think there is a tutorial for this in the tutorial section

but if you want people to easily be able to get runes then in your client.java search for cbrunes and make the player rights = 0 and do the same for basicrunes

Read full topic
